content: Ha detto a tutti che era al verde.
translations: eng:He told everybody he was broke
eng:He told everyone he was broke
eng:He told everyone that he was broke
eng:She told everybody she was broke
eng:She told everyone she was broke
eng:She told everyone that she was broke
